birthplace: 1115 Northwest 51st Street Seattle WA 98107, United States
overview: Fischer Plumbing has been serving greater Seattle and the Eastside with integrity and skill since 1977. We deliver responsive, friendly, and competent services to our valued customers in the areas of all things plumbing. As long time plumbers in the Seattle area, we strive to provide the best quality materials and responsive service to our all of our customers, new and old.
